### Assessment

parameters.name: ImplementationStatus
parameters.label: Status
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Not Implemented", "label": "Not Implemented", "selected":true},
    {"value": "Implemented", "label": "Implemented"},
    {"value": "Alternate Implementation", "label": "Alternate Implementation"},
    {"value": "Planned", "label": "Planned"},
    {"value": "Out of Scope", "label": "Out of Scope"}
]

content.query:
securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend failedResources = toint(properties.failedResources), passedResources = toint(properties.passedResources),skippedResources = toint(properties.skippedResources)
    | where failedResources + passedResources + skippedResources > 0
    | join kind = leftouter(
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments") on subscriptionId, name
    | extend complianceState = properties.state
    | extend resourceSource = tolower(tostring(properties1.resourceDetails.Source))
    | extend recommendationId = id1
    | extend resourceId = trim(' ', tolower(tostring(case(resourceSource =~ 'azure', properties1.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'gcp', properties1.resourceDetails.GcpResourceId,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'aws', properties1.resourceDetails.AwsResourceId,
                                                        extract('^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$',1,recommendationId)))))
    | extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/([^/]+)$", resourceId)[0]
    | extend resourceType = iff(regexResourceId[1] != "", regexResourceId[1], iff(regexResourceId[0] != "", regexResourceId[0], "subscriptions"))
    | extend resourceName = regexResourceId[2]
    | extend recommendationName = name
    | extend RecommendationName = properties1.displayName
    | extend description = properties1.metadata.description
    | extend remediationSteps = properties1.metadata.remediationDescription
    | extend severity = properties1.metadata.severity
    | extend state = properties1.status.code
    | extend notApplicableReason = properties1.status.cause
    | extend RecommendationLink = properties1.links.azurePortal
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | extend complianceControlId = extract(@"/regulatoryComplianceControls/([^/]*)", 1, id)
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId == "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend  controlName = tostring(properties.description)
    | project controlId = name, controlName
    | distinct  *) on $right.controlId == $left.complianceControlId
	| where complianceControlId startswith "AU.12" and complianceControlId !contains "*"
    | summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or state == "Healthy") by tostring(RecommendationName), ControlID = controlId, recommendationName
    |‚ÄØextend‚ÄØPassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed/todouble(Total))*100
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend RecommendationName = tostring(properties.description)
    | extend RecommendationLink = tostring(properties.assessmentDetailsLink)
    | project RecommendationName, RecommendationLink) on RecommendationName  
    | distinct ControlID, RecommendationName, Total, RecommendationLink, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, recommendationName
    | sort by Total desc
content.title: [AU-12] Audit Generation -- Security Policy Recommendations
content.noDataMessage: Confirm Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance Initative for NIST SP 800-53 R4 is enabled.

content.json:
# [Security Assessment & Authorization](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/controls?version=5.1&family=CA)
---
Security Assessment includes periodic evaluation of security controls for effectiveness.

# [Security Assessments (CA-2)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#security-assessments) a.‚ÄÉSelect the appropriate assessor or assessment team for the type of assessment to be conducted; b.‚ÄÉDevelop a control assessment plan that describes the scope of the assessment including: 1.‚ÄÉControls and control enhancements under assessment; 2.‚ÄÉAssessment procedures to be used to determine control effectiveness; and 3.‚ÄÉAssessment environment, assessment team, and assessment roles and responsibilities; c.‚ÄÉEnsure the control assessment plan is reviewed and approved by the authorizing official or designated representative prior to conducting the assessment; d.‚ÄÉAssess the controls in the system and its environment of operation [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] to determine the extent to which the controls are implemented correctly, operating as intended, and producing the desired outcome with respect to meeting established security and privacy requirements; e.‚ÄÉProduce a control assessment report that document the results of the assessment; and f.‚ÄÉProvide the results of the control assessment to [Assignment: organization-defined individuals or roles]. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecureScores](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securescores) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [Secure Score in Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/defender-for-cloud/secure-score-security-controls)
üí° [Microsoft Secure Score](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/defender/microsoft-secure-score?)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Recommendations](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/5)
üîÄ [Microsoft 365 Defender: Secure Scores](https://security.microsoft.com/securescore)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [CA-2](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=CA-2)
### Assessment

parameters.name: ImplementationStatus
parameters.label: Status
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Not Implemented", "label": "Not Implemented", "selected":true},
    {"value": "Implemented", "label": "Implemented"},
    {"value": "Alternate Implementation", "label": "Alternate Implementation"},
    {"value": "Planned", "label": "Planned"},
    {"value": "Out of Scope", "label": "Out of Scope"}
]

content.query:
SecureScores
| where MaxScore>0
| extend subscriptionScore = CurrentScore/MaxScore 
| extend subScoreXsubWeight = subscriptionScore*Weight 
| extend Day = startofday(TimeGenerated) 
| summarize upperValue = sum(subScoreXsubWeight), underValue = sum(todouble(Weight)) by Day
| extend OverallScore = 100*((upperValue)/(underValue))
| project OverallScore, Day
content.title: [CA-2] Security Assessments --  Secure Score Over Time

# [Continuous Monitoring (CA-7)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#continuous-monitoring) Develop a system-level continuous monitoring strategy and implement continuous monitoring in accordance with the organization-level continuous monitoring strategy that includes: a.‚ÄÉEstablishing the following system-level metrics to be monitored: [Assignment: organization-defined system-level metrics]; b.‚ÄÉEstablishing [Assignment: organization-defined frequencies] for monitoring and [Assignment: organization-defined frequencies] for assessment of control effectiveness; c.‚ÄÉOngoing control assessments in accordance with the continuous monitoring strategy; d.‚ÄÉOngoing monitoring of system and organization-defined metrics in accordance with the continuous monitoring strategy; e.‚ÄÉCorrelation and analysis of information generated by control assessments and monitoring; f.‚ÄÉResponse actions to address results of the analysis of control assessment and monitoring information; and g.‚ÄÉReporting the security and privacy status of the system to [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] [Assignment: organization-defined frequency]. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityRegulatoryCompliance](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityregulatorycompliance) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
üî∑ [SecurityAlert](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityalert) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Sentinel](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/azure-sentinel/)
### Implementation üí° [Onboard Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security-center/security-center-get-started)
üí° [Add the Microsoft Defender for Cloud: NIST SP 800-53 R4 Assessment to Your Dashboard](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security-center/update-regulatory-compliance-packages#add-a-regulatory-standard-to-your-dashboard)
üí° [Automatically create incidents from Microsoft security alerts](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/create-incidents-from-alerts)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22)
üîÄ [Microsoft Sentinel](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [CA-7](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=CA-7)
### Assessment

parameters.name: ImplementationStatus
parameters.label: Status
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Not Implemented", "label": "Not Implemented", "selected":true},
    {"value": "Implemented", "label": "Implemented"},
    {"value": "Alternate Implementation", "label": "Alternate Implementation"},
    {"value": "Planned", "label": "Planned"},
    {"value": "Out of Scope", "label": "Out of Scope"}
]

content.query:
securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | join kind = leftouter(
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments") on subscriptionId, name
    | extend complianceState = properties.state
    | extend resourceSource = tolower(tostring(properties1.resourceDetails.Source))
    | extend recommendationId = id1
    | extend resourceId = trim(' ', tolower(tostring(case(resourceSource =~ 'azure', properties1.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'gcp', properties1.resourceDetails.GcpResourceId,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'aws', properties1.resourceDetails.AwsResourceId,
                                                        extract('^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$',1,recommendationId)))))
    | extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/([^/]+)$", resourceId)[0]
    | extend resourceType = iff(regexResourceId[1] != "", regexResourceId[1], iff(regexResourceId[0] != "", regexResourceId[0], "subscriptions"))
    | extend resourceName = regexResourceId[2]
    | extend recommendationName = name
    | extend RecommendationName = properties1.displayName
    | extend description = properties1.metadata.description
    | extend remediationSteps = properties1.metadata.remediationDescription
    | extend severity = properties1.metadata.severity
    | extend state = properties1.status.code
    | extend notApplicableReason = properties1.status.cause
    | extend RecommendationLink = properties1.links.azurePortal
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | extend complianceControlId = extract(@"/regulatoryComplianceControls/([^/]*)", 1, id)
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId == "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend  controlName = tostring(properties.description)
    | project controlId = name, controlName
    | distinct  *) on $right.controlId == $left.complianceControlId
    | extend RecommendationName = tostring(properties.description)
| join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend RecommendationName = tostring(properties.description)
    | extend RecommendationLink = tostring(properties.assessmentDetailsLink)
    | project RecommendationName, RecommendationLink) on RecommendationName
    | extend ComplianceDomain=iff(controlId contains "AC.", "Access Control", iff(controlId contains "AT.", "Security Awareness & Training", iff(controlId contains "AU.", "Audit & Accountability", iff(controlId contains "CA.", "Security Assessment", iff(controlId contains "CM.", "Configuration Management", iff(controlId contains "CP.", "Contingency Planning", iff(controlId contains "IA.", "Identification & Authentication", iff(controlId contains "IR.", "Incident Response", iff(controlId contains "MA.", "System Maintenance", iff(controlId contains "MP.", "Media Protection", iff(controlId contains "PE.", "Physical Protection", iff(controlId contains "PL.", "Security Planning", iff(controlId contains "PS.", "Personnel Security",iff(controlId contains "RA.", "Risk Assessment",iff(controlId contains "SA.", "System & Services Acquisition",iff(controlId contains "SC.", "System & Communications Protection",iff(controlId contains "SI.", "System & Information Integrity","Other"))))))))))))))))) 
  | distinct RecommendationName, ComplianceDomain, tostring(RecommendationLink), tostring(state), tostring(complianceState)
    | summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or complianceState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Failed"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy" or complianceState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Passed"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or state == "Healthy" or complianceState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Passed" or complianceState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Failed") by ComplianceDomain
    |‚ÄØextend‚ÄØPassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed/todouble(Total))*100
    | project ControlFamily=ComplianceDomain, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed
    | sort by Total, Passed desc
content.title: [CA-7] Continuous Monitoring -- Monitor/Alert on Compliance Posture Deviations

content.query:
let SecurityProducts = datatable(ProviderName: string, Product: string, Capability: string, Portal: string) [
    "ASI Scheduled Alerts", "Microsoft Sentinel","Security Information Event Management (SIEM)", "https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel",
    "MCAS", "Microsoft Cloud App Security","Cloud Application Security Broker (CASB)","https://portal.cloudappsecurity.com/",
    "MDATP", "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint", "Endpoint Detection & Response (EDR)","https://security.microsoft.com/homepage",
    "Azure Security Center", "Microsoft Defender for Cloud", "Cloud Workload Protection Platform (CWPP)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/0",
    "Detection-WarmPathV2", "Microsoft Defender for Cloud", "Cloud Workload Protection Platform (CWPP)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/0",
    "MicrosoftThreatProtection", "Microsoft 365 Defender", "Extensible Detection & Response (XDR)","https://security.microsoft.com/homepage",
    "IPC", "Azure Active Directory Identity Protection", "Identity & Access Management (IAM)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/IdentityProtectionMenuBlade/Overview",
    "Detection-Fusion", "Machine Learning Fusion Alert", "Machine Learning (ML)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel",
    "Sentinel Fusion", "Machine Learning Fusion Alert", "Machine Learning (ML)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel",
    "Azure Advanced Threat Protection", "Microsoft Defender for Identity", "Identity Protection (IP)","https://portal.atp.azure.com/",
    "Threat Intelligence Alerts", "Threat Intelligence", "Threat Intelligence (TI)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel",
    "IoTSecurity", "Azure Defender for IoT", "Industrial IoT Platform","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_IoT_Defender/IoTDefenderDashboard/Getting_Started",
    "MSTIC", "Microsoft Intelligent Security Graph", "Threat Intelligence (TI)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel",
    "AntimalwarePublisher", "Microsoft Anti-Malware", "Anti-Virus (AV)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/0", 
    "OATP", "Microsoft Defender for Office 365", "Email Defense","https://security.microsoft.com/homepage",
    "AdaptiveNetworkHardenings", "ASC Adaptive Network Hardening", "Network Detection & Response (NDR)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/0",
    "StorageThreatDetection", "Azure Defender for Storage", "Storage Protection","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/0",
    "CloudNetworkSecurity", "Azure Network Security","Network Detection & Response (NDR)","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Network/NetworkWatcherMenuBlade/overview",
    "SQLThreatDetection", "Azure Defender for SQL", "Database Protection","https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/0"
];
SecurityAlert
| join kind=inner SecurityProducts on ProviderName
| summarize count() by Product, Capability, Portal
| project Product, Capability, AlertsCount=count_, Portal
| sort by AlertsCount desc
content.title: [CA-7] Continuous Monitoring -- Monitor/Respond to Security Alerts

# [Configuration Management](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/controls?version=5.1&family=CM)
---
Configuration Management establishes security baselines and measures deviations provides the basis for tracking the security posture of cloud assets.

# [Baseline Configuration (CM-2)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#baseline-configuration) a.‚ÄÉDevelop, document, and maintain under configuration control, a current baseline configuration of the system; and b.‚ÄÉReview and update the baseline configuration of the system: 1. [Assignment: organization-defined frequency]; 2. When required due to [Assignment: organization-defined circumstances]; and 3. When system components are installed or upgraded. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityBaselines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securitybaseline) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [Azure security baseline for Azure Cloud Services](https://docs.microsoft.com/security/benchmark/azure/baselines/cloud-services-security-baseline)
üí° [Manage security baseline profiles in Microsoft Intune](https://docs.microsoft.com/mem/intune/protect/security-baselines-configure)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22)
üîÄ [Microsoft Endpoint Manager Admin Center](https://endpoint.microsoft.com/#home)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [CM-2](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=CM-2)
### Assessment

parameters.name: ImplementationStatus
parameters.label: Status
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Not Implemented", "label": "Not Implemented", "selected":true},
    {"value": "Implemented", "label": "Implemented"},
    {"value": "Alternate Implementation", "label": "Alternate Implementation"},
    {"value": "Planned", "label": "Planned"},
    {"value": "Out of Scope", "label": "Out of Scope"}
]

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250
content.title: [CM-2] Baseline Configuration -- Configure Security Baselines

securityresources

    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend failedResources = toint(properties.failedResources), passedResources = toint(properties.passedResources),skippedResources = toint(properties.skippedResources)
    | where failedResources + passedResources + skippedResources > 0
    | join kind = leftouter(
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments") on subscriptionId, name
    | extend complianceState = properties.state
    | extend resourceSource = tolower(tostring(properties1.resourceDetails.Source))
    | extend recommendationId = id1
    | extend resourceId = trim(' ', tolower(tostring(case(resourceSource =~ 'azure', properties1.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'gcp', properties1.resourceDetails.GcpResourceId,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'aws', properties1.resourceDetails.AwsResourceId,
                                                        extract('^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$',1,recommendationId)))))
    | extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/([^/]+)$", resourceId)[0]
    | extend resourceType = iff(regexResourceId[1] != "", regexResourceId[1], iff(regexResourceId[0] != "", regexResourceId[0], "subscriptions"))
    | extend resourceName = regexResourceId[2]
    | extend recommendationName = name
    | extend RecommendationName = properties1.displayName
    | extend description = properties1.metadata.description
    | extend remediationSteps = properties1.metadata.remediationDescription
    | extend severity = properties1.metadata.severity
    | extend state = properties1.status.code
    | extend notApplicableReason = properties1.status.cause
    | extend RecommendationLink = properties1.links.azurePortal
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | extend complianceControlId = extract(@"/regulatoryComplianceControls/([^/]*)", 1, id)
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId == "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend  controlName = tostring(properties.description)
    | project controlId = name, controlName
    | distinct  *) on $right.controlId == $left.complianceControlId
	| where complianceControlId startswith "CM.6"
    | summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or state == "Healthy") by tostring(RecommendationName), ControlID = controlId, recommendationName
    |‚ÄØextend‚ÄØPassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed/todouble(Total))*100
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "back" or Description contains "recover" or Description contains "restore"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "back" or Description contains "recover" or Description contains "restore"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "back" or Description contains "recover" or Description contains "restore"
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| where Description !contains "feedback" and Description !contains "fallback"
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250
content.title: [CP-9] Information System Backup -- Configure Security Baselines

# [Identification & Authentication](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/controls?version=5.1&family=IA)
---
Identification & Authentication Management is the process of managing user, system, asset identities and controlling access to authorized resources.

# [Organizational Users (IA-2)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#identification-and-authentication-organizational-users) Uniquely identify and authenticate organizational users and associate that unique identification with processes acting on behalf of those users. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SigninLogs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/signinlogs) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Entra ID](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/active-directory/)
üî∑ [SecurityRegulatoryCompliance](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityregulatorycompliance) üî∑ [SecurityBaselines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securitybaseline) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [What is Conditional Access?](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/conditional-access/overview)
üí° [Building a Conditional Access policy](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/conditional-access/concept-conditional-access-policies)
üí° [How it works: Microsoft Entra ID Multi-Factor Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/concept-mfa-howitworks)
üí° [Plan an Microsoft Entra ID Multi-Factor Authentication deployment](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/howto-mfa-getstarted)
üí° [What is Azure role-based access control (Azure RBAC)?](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/role-based-access-control/overview)
üí° [Apply Azure security baselines to machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/defender-for-cloud/apply-security-baseline)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID: Users](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/UsersManagementMenuBlade/MsGraphUsers)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID: Conditional Access](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ConditionalAccessBlade/Policies)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [IA-2](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=IA-2)
### Assessment

content.query:
let LastObserved = SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by UserPrincipalName
| project UserPrincipalName, LastSignIn=TimeGenerated;
SigninLogs
| extend UserProfile = strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/UserDetailsMenuBlade/Profile/userId/", UserId)
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, UserType, UserProfile, UserId
| join (LastObserved) on UserPrincipalName
| where UserType == "Member"
| project UserPrincipalName, UserType, SignInCount=count_, UserProfile, LastSignIn, UserId
| sort by SignInCount desc
| limit 250

content.query:
securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend failedResources = toint(properties.failedResources), passedResources = toint(properties.passedResources),skippedResources = toint(properties.skippedResources)
    | where failedResources + passedResources + skippedResources > 0
    | join kind = leftouter(
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments") on subscriptionId, name
    | extend complianceState = properties.state
    | extend resourceSource = tolower(tostring(properties1.resourceDetails.Source))
    | extend recommendationId = id1
    | extend resourceId = trim(' ', tolower(tostring(case(resourceSource =~ 'azure', properties1.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'gcp', properties1.resourceDetails.GcpResourceId,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'aws', properties1.resourceDetails.AwsResourceId,
                                                        extract('^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$',1,recommendationId)))))
    | extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/([^/]+)$", resourceId)[0]
    | extend resourceType = iff(regexResourceId[1] != "", regexResourceId[1], iff(regexResourceId[0] != "", regexResourceId[0], "subscriptions"))
    | extend resourceName = regexResourceId[2]
    | extend recommendationName = name
    | extend RecommendationName = properties1.displayName
    | extend description = properties1.metadata.description
    | extend remediationSteps = properties1.metadata.remediationDescription
    | extend severity = properties1.metadata.severity
    | extend state = properties1.status.code
    | extend notApplicableReason = properties1.status.cause
    | extend RecommendationLink = properties1.links.azurePortal
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | extend complianceControlId = extract(@"/regulatoryComplianceControls/([^/]*)", 1, id)
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId == "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend  controlName = tostring(properties.description)
    | project controlId = name, controlName
    | distinct  *) on $right.controlId == $left.complianceControlId
	| where complianceControlId startswith "IA.2.*"
    | summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or state == "Healthy") by tostring(RecommendationName), ControlID = controlId, recommendationName
    |‚ÄØextend‚ÄØPassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed/todouble(Total))*100
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend RecommendationName = tostring(properties.description)
    | extend RecommendationLink = tostring(properties.assessmentDetailsLink)
    | project RecommendationName, RecommendationLink) on RecommendationName  
    | distinct ControlID, RecommendationName, Total, RecommendationLink, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, recommendationName
    | sort by Total, Passed desc
content.title: [IA-2] Identification and Authentication -- Security Policy Recommendations
content.noDataMessage: Confirm Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance Initative for NIST SP 800-53 R4 is enabled.

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "authentication"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "authentication"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "authentication"
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250

# [Identifier Management (IA-4)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#identifier-management) Manage system identifiers by: a.‚ÄÉReceiving authorization from [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] to assign an individual, group, role, service, or device identifier; b.‚ÄÉSelecting an identifier that identifies an individual, group, role, service, or device; c.‚ÄÉAssigning the identifier to the intended individual, group, role, service, or device; and d.‚ÄÉPreventing reuse of identifiers for [Assignment: organization-defined time period]. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityRegulatoryCompliance](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityregulatorycompliance) üî∑ [SecurityBaselines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securitybaseline) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [Microsoft Entra ID fundamentals documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/fundamentals/)
üí° [Govern access for external users in Microsoft Entra ID entitlement management](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/governance/entitlement-management-external-users)
üí° [Use activity filters and create action policies with Microsoft Defender for Identity in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps](https://docs.microsoft.com/defender-for-identity/activities-filtering-mcas)
üí° [Security assessment: Dormant entities in sensitive groups](https://docs.microsoft.com/defender-for-identity/cas-isp-dormant-entities#how-do-i-use-this-security-assessment)
üí° [Create an access review of groups and applications in Microsoft Entra ID](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/governance/create-access-review)
üí° [How to detect inactive user accounts](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/howto-manage-inactive-user-accounts#how-to-detect-inactive-user-accounts)
üí° [How To: Manage inactive user accounts in Microsoft Entra ID](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/howto-manage-inactive-user-accounts)
üí° [Apply Azure security baselines to machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/defender-for-cloud/apply-security-baseline)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ActiveDirectoryMenuBlade/Overview)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID: Identity Governance - Access Reviews](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_ERM/DashboardBlade/Controls)

# [Authenticator Management (IA-5)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#identifier-management) Manage system authenticators by: a.‚ÄÉVerifying, as part of the initial authenticator distribution, the identity of the individual, group, role, service, or device receiving the authenticator; b.‚ÄÉEstablishing initial authenticator content for any authenticators issued by the organization; c.‚ÄÉEnsuring that authenticators have sufficient strength of mechanism for their intended use; d.‚ÄÉEstablishing and implementing administrative procedures for initial authenticator distribution, for lost or compromised or damaged authenticators, and for revoking authenticators; e.‚ÄÉChanging default authenticators prior to first use; f.‚ÄÉChanging or refreshing authenticators [Assignment: organization-defined time period by authenticator type] or when [Assignment: organization-defined events] occur; g.‚ÄÉProtecting authenticator content from unauthorized disclosure and modification; h.‚ÄÉRequiring individuals to take, and having devices implement, specific controls to protect authenticators; and i.‚ÄÉChanging authenticators for group or role accounts when membership to those accounts changes. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityRegulatoryCompliance](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityregulatorycompliance) üî∑ [SecurityBaselines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securitybaseline) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [Enforce on-premises Microsoft Entra ID Password Protection for Active Directory Domain Services ](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/concept-password-ban-bad-on-premises)
üí° [Create a custom password policy](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory-domain-services/password-policy#create-a-custom-password-policy)
üí° [Password policies and account restrictions in Microsoft Entra ID](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/concept-sspr-policy)
üí° [Global banned password list](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/concept-password-ban-bad#global-banned-password-list)
üí° [Custom banned password list](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/authentication/concept-password-ban-bad#custom-banned-password-list)
üí° [Device password requirements](https://docs.microsoft.com/mem/intune/user-help/password-does-not-meet-it-administrator-requirements)
üí° [Compliance policy settings](https://docs.microsoft.com/mem/intune/protect/device-compliance-get-started#compliance-policy-settings)
üí° [Integrate with Conditional Access](https://docs.microsoft.com/mem/intune/protect/device-compliance-get-started#integrate-with-conditional-access)
üí° [Access model overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/key-vault/general/security-features#access-model-overview)
üí° [Apply Azure security baselines to machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/defender-for-cloud/apply-security-baseline)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22)
üîÄ [Microsoft Endpoint Manager Admin Center](https://endpoint.microsoft.com/#home)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID: Conditional Access](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ConditionalAccessBlade/Policies)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID: Password Protection](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/PasswordProtectionBlade)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra: Authenticator Management](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/AuthenticationMethodsMenuBlade/AdminAuthMethods)
üîÄ [Key Vault](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/Microsoft.KeyVault%2Fvaults)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [IA-5](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=IA-5)
### Assessment

    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, RuleSetting
| where RuleSetting contains "EnableSmartScreen" or RuleSetting contains "DisablePasswordReveal" or RuleSetting contains "DisableLockScreenAppNotifications"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, RuleSetting
| where RuleSetting contains "EnableSmartScreen" or RuleSetting contains "DisablePasswordReveal" or RuleSetting contains "DisableLockScreenAppNotifications"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, RuleSetting
| where RuleSetting contains "EnableSmartScreen" or RuleSetting contains "DisablePasswordReveal" or RuleSetting contains "DisableLockScreenAppNotifications"
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250

content.query:
let LastObserved = SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by UserPrincipalName
| project UserPrincipalName, LastSignIn=TimeGenerated;
SigninLogs
| extend UserProfile = strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/UserDetailsMenuBlade/Profile/userId/", UserId)
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, UserType, UserProfile, UserId
| join (LastObserved) on UserPrincipalName
| where UserType <> "Member"
| project UserPrincipalName, UserType, SignInCount=count_, UserProfile, LastSignIn, UserId
| sort by SignInCount desc
| limit 250

# [Incident Response](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/controls?version=5.1&family=IR)
---
Incident Response is the process of responding to cybersecurity incidents and events. Incident Response includes preparation, identification, containment, eradication, recovery, and lessons learned phases.

# [Incident Response Testing (IR-3)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#incident-response-testing) Test the effectiveness of the incident response capability for the system [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] using the following tests: [Assignment: organization-defined tests]. ## Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityIncident](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityincident) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Sentinel](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/azure-sentinel/)
### Implementation üí° [Incident response planning](https://docs.microsoft.com/security/compass/incident-response-planning)
üí° [Simulate a phishing attack in Defender for Office 365](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/office-365-security/attack-simulation-training?)
üí° [How to Generate Microsoft Sentinel Incidents for Testing](https://azurecloudai.blog/2021/05/24/how-to-generate-azure-sentinel-incidents-for-testing/)
üí° [Experience Microsoft Defender for Endpoint through simulated attacks](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/defender-endpoint/attack-simulations)
üí° [Testing with the Microsoft Sentinel Training Lab](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-sentinel-blog/learning-with-the-microsoft-sentinel-training-lab/ba-p/2953403)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Sentinel](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel)
üîÄ [Microsoft 365 Defender: Attack Simulation](https://security.microsoft.com/attacksimulator?viewid=overview)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [IR-3](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=IR-3)
### Assessment

parameters.name: ImplementationStatus
parameters.label: Status
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Not Implemented", "label": "Not Implemented", "selected":true},
    {"value": "Implemented", "label": "Implemented"},
    {"value": "Alternate Implementation", "label": "Alternate Implementation"},
    {"value": "Planned", "label": "Planned"},
    {"value": "Out of Scope", "label": "Out of Scope"}
]

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| where Title contains "test"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * 'https://portal.azure.com/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250
content.title: [IR-3] Incident Response Testing -- Incident Tests
content.noDataMessage: No Incidents Observed For This Technique Within These Thresholds

# [Incident Handling (IR-4)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#incident-handling) a.‚ÄÉImplement an incident handling capability for incidents that is consistent with the incident response plan and includes preparation, detection and analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery; b.‚ÄÉCoordinate incident handling activities with contingency planning activities; c.‚ÄÉIncorporate lessons learned from ongoing incident handling activities into incident response procedures, training, and testing, and implement the resulting changes accordingly; and d.‚ÄÉEnsure the rigor, intensity, scope, and results of incident handling activities are comparable and predictable across the organization. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityIncident](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityincident) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Sentinel](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/azure-sentinel/) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft 365 Defender](https://www.microsoft.com/security/business/threat-protection/microsoft-365-defender) ### Implementation üí° [Investigate incidents with Microsoft Sentinel](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/investigate-cases)

content.title: [IR-5] Incident Monitoring -- High Severity Incidents over Time
content.noDataMessage: An Empty Panel Provides Opportunity To Explore Further and Implement Hardening. Controls: Confirm Licensing, Availability, and Health of Respective Offerings. Logging: Confirm Log Source is Onboarded to the Log Analytics Workspace. Time: Adjust the Time Parameter for a Larger Data-Set.

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber
| where Status == "Closed"
| extend TimeToRespond =  (CreatedTime - FirstActivityTime)/1d 
| extend TimeToResolve =  (ClosedTime - CreatedTime)/1d
| extend AssignedAnalyst = tostring(Owner.assignedTo)
| extend ["MITRE ATT&CK Tactics"] = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics))[0])
| parse IncidentUrl with * 'https://portal.azure.com/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, ClosedTime desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, ["MITRE ATT&CK Tactics"], AssignedAnalyst, Classification, ClassificationComment, ClassificationReason, Description, TimeToRespond, TimeToResolve, IncidentStartTime=CreatedTime, IncidentClosedTime=ClosedTime, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250

# [Media Protection](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/controls?version=5.1&family=MP)
---
Media protection includes physical, logical, and administrative controls over sensitive data.

# [Media Access (MP-2)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#media-access) Restrict access to [Assignment: organization-defined types of digital and/or non-digital media] to [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles]. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [InformationProtectionEvents](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/information-protection/audit-logs) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Azure Information Protection](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/information-protection/)
üî∑ [OfficeActivity](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/officeactivity) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Office 365]( https://www.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/office-365-defender)

# [Media Transport (MP-5)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#media-transport) a.‚ÄÉProtect and control [Assignment: organization-defined types of system media] during transport outside of controlled areas using [Assignment: organization-defined controls]; b.‚ÄÉMaintain accountability for system media during transport outside of controlled areas; c.‚ÄÉDocument activities associated with the transport of system media; and d.‚ÄÉRestrict the activities associated with the transport of system media to authorized personnel. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityBaselines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securitybaseline) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [Azure Key Vault basic concepts](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/key-vault/general/basic-concepts)
üí° [Quickstart: Create a new Azure Information Protection label for specific users](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/information-protection/quickstart-label-specificusers)
üí° [Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Device Control Device Installation](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/defender-endpoint/mde-device-control-device-installation?#allow-or-block-removable-devices)
üí° [Quickstart: Create a new Azure Information Protection label for specific users](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/information-protection/quickstart-label-specificusers)
üí° [Customer Lockbox for Microsoft Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security/fundamentals/customer-lockbox-overview)
üí° [Restrict USB devices by using Intune Administrative Templates](https://docs.microsoft.com/troubleshoot/mem/intune/restrict-usb-with-administrative-template)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/0)
üîÄ [Microsoft Endpoint Manager Admin Center](https://endpoint.microsoft.com/#home)
üîÄ [Key Vault](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/Microsoft.KeyVault%2Fvaults)
üîÄ [Customer Lockbox](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Lockbox/LockboxMenu/Overview)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [MP-5](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=MP-5)
### Assessment

parameters.name: ImplementationStatus
parameters.label: Status
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Not Implemented", "label": "Not Implemented", "selected":true},
    {"value": "Implemented", "label": "Implemented"},
    {"value": "Alternate Implementation", "label": "Alternate Implementation"},
    {"value": "Planned", "label": "Planned"},
    {"value": "Out of Scope", "label": "Out of Scope"}
]

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, RuleSetting
| where RuleSetting contains "DisableRemovableDriveScanning" or RuleSetting contains "NoDriveTypeAutoRun" or RuleSetting contains "EnableInstallerDetection" or Description contains "locker"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, RuleSetting
| where RuleSetting contains "DisableRemovableDriveScanning" or RuleSetting contains "NoDriveTypeAutoRun" or RuleSetting contains "EnableInstallerDetection" or Description contains "locker"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, RuleSetting
| where RuleSetting contains "DisableRemovableDriveScanning" or RuleSetting contains "NoDriveTypeAutoRun" or RuleSetting contains "EnableInstallerDetection" or Description contains "locker"
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250
content.title: [MP-5] Media Transport -- Configure Security Baselines

# [Media Sanitization (MP-6)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4#media-sanitization) a.‚ÄÉSanitize [Assignment: organization-defined system media] prior to disposal, release out of organizational control, or release for reuse using [Assignment: organization-defined sanitization techniques and procedures]; and b.‚ÄÉEmploy sanitization mechanisms with the strength and integrity commensurate with the security category or classification of the information. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityRegulatoryCompliance](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityregulatorycompliance) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [NIST SP 800-88 R1](https://csrc.nist.gov/publications/detail/sp/800-88/rev-1/final)
üí° [Set up Microsoft Sentinel customer-managed key](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/customer-managed-keys)
üí° [Azure customer data protection](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security/fundamentals/protection-customer-data)
üí° [Data-bearing device destruction](https://docs.microsoft.com/compliance/assurance/assurance-data-bearing-device-destruction)
üí° [Equipment disposal](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security/fundamentals/physical-security#equipment-disposal)
üí° [Data retention, deletion, and destruction in Microsoft 365](https://docs.microsoft.com/compliance/assurance/assurance-data-retention-deletion-and-destruction-overview)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/22)
üîÄ [Key Vault](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/Microsoft.KeyVault%2Fvaults)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [MP-6](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=MP-6)
### Assessment

parameters.name: ImplementationStatus
parameters.label: Status
parameters.jsonData:
[
    {"value": "Not Implemented", "label": "Not Implemented", "selected":true},
    {"value": "Implemented", "label": "Implemented"},
    {"value": "Alternate Implementation", "label": "Alternate Implementation"},
    {"value": "Planned", "label": "Planned"},
    {"value": "Out of Scope", "label": "Out of Scope"}
]

content.query:
securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend failedResources = toint(properties.failedResources), passedResources = toint(properties.passedResources),skippedResources = toint(properties.skippedResources)
    | where failedResources + passedResources + skippedResources > 0
    | join kind = leftouter(
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments") on subscriptionId, name
    | extend complianceState = properties.state
    | extend resourceSource = tolower(tostring(properties1.resourceDetails.Source))
    | extend recommendationId = id1
    | extend resourceId = trim(' ', tolower(tostring(case(resourceSource =~ 'azure', properties1.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'gcp', properties1.resourceDetails.GcpResourceId,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'aws', properties1.resourceDetails.AwsResourceId,
                                                        extract('^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$',1,recommendationId)))))
    | extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/([^/]+)$", resourceId)[0]
    | extend resourceType = iff(regexResourceId[1] != "", regexResourceId[1], iff(regexResourceId[0] != "", regexResourceId[0], "subscriptions"))
    | extend resourceName = regexResourceId[2]
    | extend recommendationName = name
    | extend RecommendationName = properties1.displayName
    | extend description = properties1.metadata.description
    | extend remediationSteps = properties1.metadata.remediationDescription
    | extend severity = properties1.metadata.severity
    | extend state = properties1.status.code
    | extend notApplicableReason = properties1.status.cause
    | extend RecommendationLink = properties1.links.azurePortal
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | extend complianceControlId = extract(@"/regulatoryComplianceControls/([^/]*)", 1, id)
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId == "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend  controlName = tostring(properties.description)
    | project controlId = name, controlName
    | distinct  *) on $right.controlId == $left.complianceControlId
	| where RecommendationName contains "managed key"
    | summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or state == "Healthy") by tostring(RecommendationName), ControlID = controlId, recommendationName
    |‚ÄØextend‚ÄØPassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed/todouble(Total))*100
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend RecommendationName = tostring(properties.description)
    | extend RecommendationLink = tostring(properties.assessmentDetailsLink)
    | project RecommendationName, RecommendationLink) on RecommendationName  
    | distinct ControlID, RecommendationName, Total, RecommendationLink, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, recommendationName
    | distinct RecommendationName, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, RecommendationLink, recommendationName
    | sort by Total, Passed desc
content.title: [MP-6] Media Sanitization -- Leverage CMK for Cryptographic Erasure
content.noDataMessage: Confirm Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance Initative for NIST SP 800-53 R4 is enabled.

# [Risk Assessment](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/controls?version=5.1&family=RA)
---

# [Security Categorization (RA-2)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4?WT.mc_id=Portal-fx#security-categorization) a.‚ÄÉCategorize the system and information it processes, stores, and transmits; b.‚ÄÉDocument the security categorization results, including supporting rationale, in the security plan for the system; and c.‚ÄÉVerify that the authorizing official or authorizing official designated representative reviews and approves the security categorization decision. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [Resources](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/resource-graph/samples/starter) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Azure Resource Graph](https://azure.microsoft.com/features/resource-graph/)

# [Risk Assessment (RA-3)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4?WT.mc_id=Portal-fx#risk-assessment-1) a.‚ÄÉConduct a risk assessment, including: 1.‚ÄÉIdentifying threats to and vulnerabilities in the system; 2.‚ÄÉDetermining the likelihood and magnitude of harm from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, or destruction of the system, the information it processes, stores, or transmits, and any related information; and 3.‚ÄÉDetermining the likelihood and impact of adverse effects on individuals arising from the processing of personally identifiable information; b.‚ÄÉIntegrate risk assessment results and risk management decisions from the organization and mission or business process perspectives with system-level risk assessments; c.‚ÄÉDocument risk assessment results in [Selection: security and privacy plans; risk assessment report; [Assignment: organization-defined document]]; d.‚ÄÉReview risk assessment results [Assignment: organization-defined frequency]; e.‚ÄÉDisseminate risk assessment results to [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles]; and f.‚ÄÉUpdate the risk assessment [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] or when there are significant changes to the system, its environment of operation, or other conditions that may impact the security or privacy state of the system. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityRecommendation](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityrecommendation) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
üî∑ [SecurityIncident](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityincident) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Sentinel](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/azure-sentinel/)
üî∑ [AADUserRiskEvents](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/signinlogs) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Entra ID: Identity Protection](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/active-directory/)
### Implementation üí° [Review your security recommendations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/defender-for-cloud/review-security-recommendations)
üí° [Automatically create incidents from Microsoft security alerts](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/create-incidents-from-alerts)
üí° [Microsoft Entra ID Protection integration](https://docs.microsoft.com/defender-cloud-apps/aadip-integration)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Recommendations](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade/5)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID Protection](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/IdentityProtectionMenuBlade/Overview)
üîÄ [Microsoft Sentinel](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResource/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinel)
### NIST SP 800-53 Guidance [RA-3](https://csrc.nist.gov/Projects/risk-management/sp800-53-controls/release-search#/control?version=5.1&number=RA-3)

content.query:
SecurityRecommendation
| where RecommendationState == "Unhealthy"
| where isnotempty(RecommendationSeverity)
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by RecommendationSeverity
| render areachart

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents 
| extend RiskyUsers = strcat("https://ms.portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/RiskyUsersBlade")
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, RiskLevel, RiskyUsers
| extend Rank=iff(RiskLevel == "high", 3, iff(RiskLevel == "medium", 2, iff(RiskLevel == "low", 1, 0)))
| where UserPrincipalName <> ""
| project UserPrincipalName, RiskLevel, RiskyUsers, count_, Rank
| sort by Rank,count_ desc
| limit 250

content.json:
# [Vulnerability Scanning (RA-5)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/governance/policy/samples/nist-sp-800-53-r4?WT.mc_id=Portal-fx#vulnerability-scanning) a.‚ÄÉMonitor and scan for vulnerabilities in the system and hosted applications [Assignment: organization-defined frequency and/or randomly in accordance with organization-defined process] and when new vulnerabilities potentially affecting the system are identified and reported; b.‚ÄÉEmploy vulnerability monitoring tools and techniques that facilitate interoperability among tools and automate parts of the vulnerability management process by using standards for: 1.‚ÄÉEnumerating platforms, software flaws, and improper configurations; 2.‚ÄÉFormatting checklists and test procedures; and 3.‚ÄÉMeasuring vulnerability impact; c.‚ÄÉAnalyze vulnerability scan reports and results from vulnerability monitoring; d.‚ÄÉRemediate legitimate vulnerabilities [Assignment: organization-defined response times] in accordance with an organizational assessment of risk; e.‚ÄÉShare information obtained from the vulnerability monitoring process and control assessments with [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] to help eliminate similar vulnerabilities in other systems; and f.‚ÄÉEmploy vulnerability monitoring tools that include the capability to readily update the vulnerabilities to be scanned. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityRegulatoryCompliance](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityregulatorycompliance) üî∑ [SecurityNestedRecommendation](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securitynestedrecommendation)‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)
### Implementation üí° [Defender for Cloud's integrated Qualys vulnerability scanner for Azure and hybrid machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/defender-for-cloud/deploy-vulnerability-assessment-vm)
üí° [Threat and vulnerability management](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/defender-endpoint/next-gen-threat-and-vuln-mgt?)

üí° [Vulnerabilities in my organization - threat and vulnerability management](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/defender-endpoint/tvm-weaknesses?)

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments/subassessments"
| extend assessmentKey = extract(".*assessments/(.+?)/.*",1,  id)
| where assessmentKey == "1195afff-c881-495e-9bc5-1486211ae03f"
 | project Resource = tolower(extract("([\\s\\S]*?)(/providers/Microsoft.Security.*)",1,id)), ResourceGroup = trim_end("/",extract(".*resourceGroups/(.+?)/",0,id)), ResourceType = tolower(split(id,"/").[6]), subscriptionId, severity = tostring(parse_json(properties).status.severity), status = tostring(parse_json(properties).status.code), VulnId = tostring(parse_json(properties).id), description = tostring(parse_json(properties).displayName), patchable = parse_json(properties.additionalData).patchable, cve = parse_json(properties.additionalData).cve
 | where status == 'Unhealthy'
 | summarize dcount(VulnId) by ResourceGroup, Resource, severity, VulnId, description, tostring(patchable), tostring(cve)
 | summarize Total = count(dcount_VulnId), sevH=countif(severity=='High'), sevM=countif(severity=='Medium'), sevL=countif(severity=='Low'), patchAvailable = countif(patchable=='true'), CVEcount =countif(cve!='[]') by ResourceGroup, Resource
 | order by sevH desc
content.title: [RA-5] Vulnerability Scanning >> Select Asset for Details Below

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments/subassessments"
| extend assessmentKey = extract(".*assessments/(.+?)/.*",1,  id)
| where assessmentKey == "1195afff-c881-495e-9bc5-1486211ae03f"
| project Resource = tolower(extract("([\\s\\S]*?)(/providers/Microsoft.Security.*)",1,id)), ResourceGroup = trim_end("/",extract(".*resourceGroups/(.+?)/",0,id)), ResourceType = tolower(split(id,"/").[6]), subscriptionId, Severity = tostring(parse_json(properties).status.severity), Status = tostring(parse_json(properties).status.code), VulnId = tostring(parse_json(properties).id), Description = tostring(parse_json(properties).displayName), Patchable = parse_json(properties.additionalData).patchable, CVE = properties.additionalData.cve, Category = tostring(properties.category), TimeGenerated = tostring(properties.timeGenerated), Remediation = tostring(properties.remediation), Impact = tostring(properties.impact), Threat = tostring(properties.additionalData.threat)
| where Status == 'Unhealthy'
| where '{selectedServer}' == 'All' or Resource == '{selectedServer}'
| project Severity, VulnId, Description, tostring(Patchable), Category, Resource, ResourceGroup, CVE, TimeGenerated, Remediation, Impact, Threat
| mv-expand CveExpand = split (CVE, "},") to typeof(string)
| parse CveExpand with * '"title":"' singleCve '"' *
| summarize CVEs = tostring(make_list(singleCve)) by Severity, VulnId, Description, tostring(Patchable), Category, Resource, ResourceGroup, TimeGenerated, Threat, Impact, Remediation
content.title: [RA-5] Vulnerability Details >> Select Asset Above

content.query:
securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend failedResources = toint(properties.failedResources), passedResources = toint(properties.passedResources),skippedResources = toint(properties.skippedResources)
    | where failedResources + passedResources + skippedResources > 0
    | join kind = leftouter(
    securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/assessments") on subscriptionId, name
    | extend complianceState = properties.state
    | extend resourceSource = tolower(tostring(properties1.resourceDetails.Source))
    | extend recommendationId = id1
    | extend resourceId = trim(' ', tolower(tostring(case(resourceSource =~ 'azure', properties1.resourceDetails.Id,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'gcp', properties1.resourceDetails.GcpResourceId,
                                                        resourceSource =~ 'aws', properties1.resourceDetails.AwsResourceId,
                                                        extract('^(.+)/providers/Microsoft.Security/assessments/.+$',1,recommendationId)))))
    | extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/([^/]+)$", resourceId)[0]
    | extend resourceType = iff(regexResourceId[1] != "", regexResourceId[1], iff(regexResourceId[0] != "", regexResourceId[0], "subscriptions"))
    | extend resourceName = regexResourceId[2]
    | extend recommendationName = name
    | extend RecommendationName = properties1.displayName
    | extend description = properties1.metadata.description
    | extend remediationSteps = properties1.metadata.remediationDescription
    | extend severity = properties1.metadata.severity
    | extend state = properties1.status.code
    | extend notApplicableReason = properties1.status.cause
    | extend RecommendationLink = properties1.links.azurePortal
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | extend complianceControlId = extract(@"/regulatoryComplianceControls/([^/]*)", 1, id)
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId == "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend  controlName = tostring(properties.description)
    | project controlId = name, controlName
    | distinct  *) on $right.controlId == $left.complianceControlId
	| where complianceControlId startswith "RA.5"
    | summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(state‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or state == "Healthy") by tostring(RecommendationName), ControlID = controlId, recommendationName
    |‚ÄØextend‚ÄØPassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed/todouble(Total))*100
    | join kind = leftouter (securityresources
    | where type == "microsoft.security/regulatorycompliancestandards/regulatorycompliancecontrols/regulatorycomplianceassessments"
    | extend complianceStandardId = replace( "-", " ", extract(@'/regulatoryComplianceStandards/([^/]*)', 1, id))
    | where complianceStandardId ==  "NIST SP 800 53 R4"
    | extend RecommendationName = tostring(properties.description)
    | extend RecommendationLink = tostring(properties.assessmentDetailsLink)
    | project RecommendationName, RecommendationLink) on RecommendationName  
    | distinct ControlID, RecommendationName, Total, RecommendationLink, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, recommendationName
    | sort by Total, Passed desc
content.title: [RA-5] Vulnerability Scan -- Security Policy Recommendations
content.noDataMessage: Confirm Microsoft Defender for Cloud: Regulatory Compliance Initative for NIST SP 800-53 R4 is enabled.

| where Title contains "dos"

    | extend regexResourceId = extract_all(@"/providers/[^/]+(?:/([^/]+)/[^/]+(?:/[^/]+/[^/]+)?)?/([^/]+)/([^/]+)$", resourceId)[0]
